mapper.sql: id, sr_name, sr_type, file, url, sr_index, out_id, flag, remarks, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_resources ( sr_name, sr_type, file, url, sr_index, out_id, flag, remarks, create_time, update_time) values ( #{srName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

id,
sr_name,

file,

sr_index,
out_id,

mapper.update:
update sys_resources
sr_name = #{srName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr_type = #{srType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr_index = #{srIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
out_id = #{outId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_resources set sr_name = #{srName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr_type = #{srType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr_index = #{srIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, out_id = #{outId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( max( sr_index ), 0 ) + 1 FROM sys_resources WHERE sr_type = #{type}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_resources ( sr_name, sr_type, file, url, sr_index, out_id, flag, remarks) values ( #{srName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
